divs: Sighting DetailsWe (my daughter and I) noticed ppl pulling over outside our street and they shouted 4 us 2 look outside. NE in the sky about 11:45 pm we saw a couple thousands lights that were blue, purple, white, and red. They were clustered then formed into a line then disappeared. We live in ABQ, NM. Did this happened to anyone else? I was so amazed I contacted the news. ALOT of ppl were pulling over and attempting to take photos, etc of this
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around October 15th 2011
Summary: ABQ: We noticed ppl pulling over outside our street and NE in the sky about 11:45 pm we saw a couple thousands lights ...
